price: 47. Loba: Bokanisi nini soki etumbu ya Allah eyeli bino mbalakaka to polele? Boye, ekobebisama sé bato mabe (babubi)?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illā al-qawmu al-ẓālimūna
